ing: 1 cup vanilla-flavored coconut milk beverage (such as SilkÂ®)
des:
"A warm, made-from-scratch treat!
 Cocoa leads to a bittersweet chocolate taste and the coconut milk adds a hint of richness."
ins: Stir coconut milk beverage, cocoa powder, sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon together in a saucepan over medium heat until cocoa and sugar are completely dissolved and mixture is heated through, 5 to 10 minutes. Pour hot cocoa into a mug.
